seo.title: Conference Event App | Summits & Conventions | Micepad
seo.description: Power your conferences with Micepad's event app. Agenda management, speaker profiles, networking, and live engagement for events of any size.

hero.headline: Event App for Conferences
hero.subheadline: Everything attendees need in one app - agenda, speakers, networking, and more

benefits.title: Dynamic Agenda
benefits.description: Multi-track schedules with personalized session bookmarking.

benefits.title: Speaker Profiles
benefits.description: Showcase speakers with bios, social links, and session details.

benefits.title: Attendee Networking
benefits.description: In-app messaging and meeting scheduling between attendees.

benefits.title: Live Engagement
benefits.description: Polls, Q&A, and live reactions during sessions.

faq.question: How many attendees can the app support?
faq.answer: Micepad scales from 50 to 50,000+ attendees with no performance issues.

faq.question: Can attendees build their own schedule?
faq.answer: Yes, attendees can bookmark sessions and get reminders before they start.
